A placebo tirilazad also administer . A second group receive MePRDL load dose continuous infusion maintain 48 hour . A placebo tirilazad also administer . A third group receive 48-hour infusion tirilazad initial bolus dose MePRDL . Eight additional dos tirilazad administer intravenous push . The MePRDL load dose may omit patient receive prestudy MePRDL dose . Patients follow 72 hour , 6 week , 6 month , 1 year injury .
